channel.title: Client Crashes
channel.description:
Hey guys, so i am having this annoying problem for a bit , i tryed to reinstall my jdk but its did not work. The problem is i open up a source , load the client and succesfuly log in. But then once i click somewhere to move the client close. Example fo what show in the running server cmd :
Le chemin d'accès spécifié est introuvable. Enforcing Devolution client requirement Corby Xevolution Made by -Valentino. Connection from 127.0.0.1:4242 [client-1-Valentino]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 12 ms] [client-1-Valentino]: atObject2: 3095,3491 objectID: 2213 Game saved for player Valentino ClientHandler: Client Valentino disconnected (127.0.0.1)
Hope anyone can help me solving the issue, im on windows 7 jdk 6u21 , classpath and path set correctly.

item.title: Client Crashes
item.dc:creator: @kossploss kossploss
item.description:
@kossploss wrote:

Hey guys, so i am having this annoying problem for a bit , i tryed to reinstall my jdk but its did not work. The problem is i open up a source , load the client and succesfuly log in. But then once i click somewhere to move the client close. Example fo what show in the running server cmd :

Le chemin d’accès spécifié est introuvable.
Enforcing Devolution client requirement
Corby Xevolution Made by -Valentino.
Connection from 127.0.0.1:4242
[client-1-Valentino]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 12 ms]
[client-1-Valentino]: atObject2: 3095,3491 objectID: 2213
Game saved for player Valentino
ClientHandler: Client Valentino disconnected (127.0.0.1)

Hope anyone can help me solving the issue, im on windows 7 jdk 6u21 , classpath and path set correctly.
